text: Really nice pizza.. They got delayed to prepare it. So they gave us free gift card to use in next visit. Thats customer care..

name: R Patrick Roll
text: The "White Cheesey" is Second to None for a Non-Traditional Pizza. The Garlic Butter Sauce, Roma Tomatoes, Bacon and Feta Cheese makes for a Taste Sensation for the Discerning Pizza Aficionado. Also for a Hoagie it's Impossible to Beat ‚Ä¶More

name: Aryn May
text: The absolute worst pizza I've ever had. Theres a saying even when pizza is bad it's still good because everyone loves pizza. This saying is usually true however I couldn't even finish it. If you're going to eat this pizza make sure to stop ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom Turtle
text: We went in to order and were worried about slow service. The lady behind the counter was suuuper nice, and the people working in the back were enthusiastic at 10:30pm. What kind of Willy Wonka world opened up in Oxford. Service was fast. Pizza was a beautiful work of art. 6/5

name: Jake Payne
text: Friendly service good food and reasonably priced. And good deals on all carryout orders on Sunday. Or at least when i went.lol

text: The staff was friendly and food was so delicious.

name: Laura Gaddis
text: They refused to deliver to us (we live in Oxford about 4 minutes away) and refused to honor the discount code that would only work online (which wouldn't register because our address wouldn't work in their system). We hung up and ordered from Dominoes instead.

name: Emily Woolfork
text: I always order pick up and everything is always on time and delicious! Had nothing but great experiences and the staff is very kind!

name: Jeff Allen
text: Great salads, pizza, hoagies, and service...and deals deals deals!

text: Everything about it is great! The food, the people, the atmosphere!!

name: Jess Pax
text: The workers were over-involved in the ordering process and somehow still unhelpful. After a lengthy order time involving multiple workers and about 15 minutes, we finally paid and sat down in store to await our pizza. About 40 more minutes ‚Ä¶More

text: Good service,I love the thin crust veggie pizza and salad.
